captions.text: Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Whether it's good or bad.

Whether a thorn pierces
or a knife stabs.
l will tell the truth.

Whether a bomb drops or
there is an explosion.
Our happiness, our sorrow.
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Here lovers tell each other.

Meet in such a way that people
won't come to know.
Meeting covertly and having fun.

Meeting and sharing
joy and sorrow.
Look, look, look!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!
Don't say it to anybody!

What is this? Just one
round made you tired.
You have really grown old.
Yes. l have grown old.

You people take rounds like
bullocks to look younger.
Go, go, go!
Are we bullocks?

No! Bullocks at least
help to dig out oil.

What do you people do..
you only know that.

l come here because.. l get to meet
my old friends in the morning.
And l feel happy too.
Yes!
Liyakat is right!
Yes, l forgot to tell you!

Lala is going to return from
Lucknow in a day or two.
Wow! Wow! Wow! What news!
Now our group will become lively!

No matter what.. he is the only
young man amongst all of us!

Yes. There is no doubt in this.
A man is young at heart.

lf exercise can make
a person young..

..then he would have become
young a long time ago.
And look at this fatso!
He takes at least 14 rounds.

But instead of reducing he
is going on becoming fat.

Maybe after taking the rounds
he feels so hungry..

..that he eats to his heart's
content at home.

No matter what.. only
we old people..

..are to be seen in the
park in the morning.

But not a single youth
is to be seen.
What a weird generation!

They stay awake when they
should be sleeping.

And they sleep when
they should be awake.

Sir! Sir! Wake up! How
Iong will you sleep!
Sir is about to return.

What's the time?
- 7:30!

l slept late as l was
repairing this radio.
Why do you do these things?

You are an officer in a company.
Do your work.

Working as an officer
is not as enjoyable..
..as repairing these broken things.

Uncle, when uncle Liyakat comes,
give him this radio.

Tel him that now it's
working properly.
Okay, dear. l will give it to him.

Dhiru!
- Yes!

ls Ramesh ready?
- Yes.

Serve breakfast!
- Okay!
Father, take this.
So this is your 7th salary.

Are you happy with your work, son?
- Absolutely, father!
l am happy to know that!
To be ambitious is a good thing!

But being too ambitious
is also not good.

So you should have some
ambition in life.

The height of the tree
is not so important.

How deep the roots are,
that is important.

Good morning, sir! - Greetings. Good
morning, sir! - Good morning, sir!

Morning!
- Good morning, sir!

Good morning! - Good morning! Good
morning, sir! - Good morning!

Good morning, sir!
- Good morning! Good morning!
- Good morning, sir!

Hello. Good morning!
- Good morning, sir!
Today l am again late!
So what? You are the boss.

God is the real boss! l want
your advice for two things.

Tell me, sir.
- Have a seat.

For the past 1-1 1l2 months
l have been thinking..

..that there is a manager
in Pune branch.
And here we have two.
Meaning general manager and manager.
Meaning you.

So why don't we vacant this
office's manager post?
What is the need of a manager..
..when general manager is there?
What are you thinking?

No, sir! What is there to
think! You are right!

So from today you no longer
hold this post.

Sir, it means.. from today itself
l will take my leave. - Leave?

Yes, sir. l will have to
search for another job.

Why somewhere else? Why
not in this office?

The thing is that general
manager has now grown old.
Now l can't work.

l want your advice. What if l
appoint you as the general manager?
What are you saying, sir?

You will understand that when
you will grow old like me.

And when you will get an
honest and hard working..
..manager like Ramesh Trivedi.
l don't have any wife or children.
So for whom should l toil so much?

Now l will live the rest
of my life merrily.
Sir.. sir.. can l touch your feet?

Not because you want to make
me the general manager.
But because you trust me so much!
l want to take your blessing, sir!
God bless you, dear!

Sir, pardon me. But you have worn
two different colours' socks.

The thing is that my paunch is so
big that l can't bend and see.

And l don't have any
kin who will tell me.

l only have a nephew. She
has completed her MBBS.

She will return after completing
her internship.

Then she only will look
after my socks.

Now go. Look after your
post. l am leaving.

But sir.. those stenotypes who
are coming for the interview..

They are coming to meet
the general manager.
So you only handle it. l am leaving.
Hello.
Hello, father!

Father.. l want to
give you good news!

Just now l have been made the
general manager of the company.
God bless you!

Father, bless me. l should
be worthy of this.

Nobody becomes worthy
with blessings, son.

Honesty and hard work
makes you worthy.
l am keeping this here.

Father, l will come home and tell
you everything in detail. Okay.

Excuse me.
- l was waiting for you only.

Listen..
- One moment please.
Ms. Dorothy Johnson. Please come.
Sit down please!

What's your speed?
- Speed?
Yes. Speed meaning how fast are you?
Around 70-80.

lf the road is clear, then
l do touch 90 or 100.

Are you telling me your
driving speed? - Yes.

Look, we had given
the advertisement..

..for a stenotype and
not for a driver.

And l was asking about
your typing speed.
l don't know typing.

lf you don't know typing, then
why have you come here?
l.. l mean.. my uncle..

Ma'am, don't send your
uncle's friends here.

Recommendation doesn't
work in this office.

This is the misfortune
of our country.

There is no capability. There
is only recommendation.

You won't get a iob
by recommendation.

You are so weird! l have
not come here for a job.

Even if you want a iob, still
l won't give it to you.

Listen, mister! There is a limit
to everything! My uncle..
Again your uncle!

What will your uncle do if
l don't give you a job?
Will he shoot me? What will he do?

He won't shoot you! But
he will surely sack you!
Sack me?

l think you have been mistaken.
You are mister..
Ramesh Trivedi. General manager.

May l come in, sir?
- Come in!

Good morning, sir!
- Good morning! Tell me!
Sir, l was called for an interview.

You?
- Yes!

Then you?
- Ramola Sharma.

Ramola Sharma. But here Dorothy
Johnson is written.
That's my name.

Yours?
- Yes!
Then who are you?

l said l am Ramola Sharma!
Dr. Ramola Sharma!

But l didn't know that uncle
has sold his business!
Uncle? Uncle who?

l am Om Prakash's nephew!
l have come from Delhi.
When l went home, it was locked.

Maybe the servant had gone out.
So l came straight here.
So you are sir's doctor nephew!
Excuse me.. Ms.. Ms. Johnson.

Please wait outside for a minute.
- Okay.

Thank you. Please have a seat!
- Thank you.

What will you have? Tea or
coffee or something cold?

Water.
- Surely.
Lala, you!
When did you return from Lucknow?
Pundit, you are a fool!

Had l come yesterday.. we would
have met yesterday itself.

Yes, yes!
- Have you brought pe_ume?

Yes!
- This time l want Khus pe_ume.

Kamlakar, are you a man or
a fool? Learn some manners!
Why are you getting so angry?
l am bound to get angry!
You are my friend. So l pardon you.

But if you even mentioned Khus
pe_ume of Lucknow in..

..this bad weather then l will file
your report in the police station!
This man is disgracing pe_ume.
Even pe_umes have their own season.

Now to make him happy Tansen
can't sing Raag Darbari..
..in the afternoon.

So Khus pe_ume is used
during heat waves time

How can Khus pe_ume survive
Mumbai's weather?
Liyakat, take this!

l have got it for everybody!
- Thanks!

Has sister-in-law come?
- Why won't she come?
My wife is where l am.
Daughter-in-law! Daughter-in-law!
Who?

Fool, do l have to explain
which daughter-in-law?
l am calling Ramesh's wife.
He has still not got married.
What are you saying, Kailashpati?
You have still not got him married?
A young son is like a kite.

lf you leave them loose
for a moment..

..you will find it in
the opposite roof.

Youth is not something to be
kept in the fixed deposit.
You have to spend it.
lf you will get your son married..

..then his youth will be
spend in the right way.
Otherwise he will lose his way.

lf there is a competition in
talks then nobody can defeat him.
l can give you good news.

With everybody's blessing..
Ramesh has become..
..his company's general manager.
Wow! Wow! Wow! Shake hands!

Let's have a cigarette
to celebrate this news!
No! Doctor has forbidden!
But the doctor is not here.

So a drag to celebrate
his promotion.

Ramesh ioined the company
7 months ago, didn't he?

And so soon you made him
the general manager.

lt's not right to trust
somebody so much, uncle.

lf l won't trust him then
whom will l trust?

What's so special about him
that you praise him so much?
He has that quality which is not..

..easily found in this
generation's youth.

Hard working, loyal.
Jack of all trade.
Do you know?

Once my office's 100 years
old clock got damaged.
Kolkata's company gave an estimate..
..of 1000 rupees to repair it.

And Ramesh repaired it at
a cost of 24.90 rupees.

So open a clock repairing shop
and make him the in-charge.
You trust anybody so soon!

No, no, dear. He is
an honest fellow.

He is a Chartered Accountant.
And he is so intelligent that..

l am sorry, uncle. l found him
foolish and not intelligent.

He can't differentiate between
a typist and a doctor.
Can l come in, sir?
Come, come, come, Ramesh!

Greetings, sir!
- Come! Come! Have a seat!

You will live long! We were
just talking about you.
ls that so? How come, sir?

Ramola raised your topic.
What has brought you here?
Sir, l wanted your signature.
You should have sent a peon.
Now you are the general manager.

Sir, it's my first day. So
l am still not used to it.

Okay. Where to sign?
- Here! But sir, first read it.

You have read it, haven't you?
- Yes.
Then what is the need?

No, sir. You shouldn't
trust anybody blindly.
Am l right, Ramola?
Yes!

Sir, l don't know why you made
me the general manager.

l might be a fool. Sir,
it's possible.
Am l right, Ramola?
What do l know?
No, no! You are a doctor!

You can understand it
by seeing the face.
Yes, l understand but..
Forget it. Get tea for Ramesh.
No, no, sir! Thank you!
Don't worry. l make good tea.

No.. doctors have
started scaring me.
Sir, greetings. Greetings.

Dear, l think he heard you
when he was outside.
Uncle.. l take back my opinion.

Your general manager
is not so foolish.
Can l get a cup of tea, uncle?

Why not, dear? First take this.
- What? What is this?
Open it and see!

No need to say. When
did Mr. Lala return?
Today in the morning.

Has he come alone or
aunt too has come?

l have heard that they
both have come.
Wow! Did you see this, uncle?

As soon as they both returned to
Mumbai, l received a promotion.
l will go and meet them. Wow!

Have your tea!
- l will come back and have it!

At times in the night.
At times in the morning.
l was saying.. in Mumbai.
At least let me read this page!
No! First answer me!
First hear this poem!

..which says, blood of
how many do you want.

Let it be! Leave your poems!
It's a useless thing!
When we return from Lucknow, poems.
When we go to Lucknow, poems.
As if Lucknow is some shop of poems!

Darling, for the past 30 years
you have been living..

..in the lane where Waiid
Ali Shah used to live.
And you still talk like this.

What destiny! Can l
come in, Mr. Lala?
Come! Come! General manager! Come!
First let me go inside.

Greetings, aunt!
- God bless you!

He is Ramesh! You were
saying General Manager!

Aunt, both of yours blessing has
made me a general manager.

l see!
- Have sweets!

Have a seat! l will bring tea
for you! Sit! - Come! Come!
Bless you!

l have brought special
betel leaf for you!
Betel leaf! Wow!

Pundit gave me the good
news in the morning.

So let's have a cigarette
to celebrate this news.

Cigarette! l..
- l know that you smoke!

No need to feel shy. l am not
just your father's friend.
l am your friend too.

Before your aunt brings tea,
Iet's have a cigarette.

Mr. Lala, the doctor has
forbidden you, hasn't he?
So l won't eat your betel leaf too!
Mr. Lala, what is this? Have this!
Betel leaf!

Doctor..
- l know what you are saying.

Doctor has only forbidden
me from smoking.

He didn't say not to have
an unlit cigarette.
Dear, take this.
What is all this, uncle Bholu?

l think nobody has touched this
room for the past 2 years.
Touched? What are you saying, dear?

lt's forbidden to enter this room.
- Why?

Because till the time
your aunt was alive..

..she herself used
to clean this room.

After her death.. once l
was cleaning this room.

Suddenly l broke one of
the marriage mementoes.

Oh my God! Sir was so angry! l
have never seen him so angry!

Somehow l pleaded with
him and saved my job!

l have been working here
since a long time.
Maybe that's why he pardoned me.

Do one thing. Keep the tea there.
And bring a broom.
Oh my! l broke this clock!

Oh my God! This too was
his marriage memento!
Now what to do, uncle?
He won't banish you from the house.

But l think he won't eat
or drink for 10 days.

l will go to the temple
and pray for you both.
God, protect them!

'Once my office's 100 years
old clock got damaged#

'Kolkata's company
gave an estimate..
..of 1000 rupees to repair it#

'And Ramesh repaired it at
a cost of 24.90 rupees#

Hello! Ramola! This
is Ramesh speaking!

Listen! l am in a grave trouble!
That's why l have called you!
Please come here immediately.
l am almost in tears.
Why? Why are you in tears?

l dropped an expensive
clock and it broke.

l have heard that you are an
expert in repairing clocks.
Please repair this too.
Otherwise how will l face uncle?

You don't worry. l will be
there soon with the tools.

But listen.. Iet the clock
remain the way it is.

Please don't use your doctor's
knowledge on it.
Yes! Please come soon!

Okay! l will tell the cab driver
to drive with your speed. Bye.
Greetings.

You have come! l was
waiting for you only!

Where is it?
- Here it is!

Oh my God! This is
completely damaged!
This is a serious surgical case.

Whatever.. please repair
it before uncle returns.

You see.. this clock
is aunt's memento.

And it is dearer to
uncle than his life.
Please do something.
Look, Ramola. It's my iob to try.
The rest lies in God's hand.

By the way l think along with
medicine..
..prayer too will be required.
Even l need tea.

Yes, yes! l will get it quickly!
- Thank you!
Come, darling!
Ramola!

Brother Mansukh! Have a seat.
l will just come.
Okay! Darling, sit!

What is going on?
- This clock..

Are you repairing the clock
or breaking it? - What?
l am trying to repair it.
Did you see this, darling?

Uncle wastes his money
on useless things.
People keep antique for show-off.

And uncle keeps antique
to know the time. - Aunt?

Not aunt! Antique! Old, ramshackle,
useless things.
Like your father.

Tell me something.
Where is your shop?

Where there is a clock.
- What?
l mean l don't have a shop.

People call me to their home. And
l go and repair their clock.
You mean home service.
l see! But what are your charges?

l work on trust.
- You will surely progress.
l iust need your favour.

You too give me some
chance to serve you.

l would have surely given
you the chance to serve me.

But l don't live here.
l live in Pune.

Hi, brother Mansukh!
- Hi, Ramola!

Here is your tea!
- Thank you!
Ramola, meet her. Sangeeta.

Hello.
- Hello.

She is my fiancé. Sangeeta
sings so sweetly.
lf there is no desert after supper..

..then iust hearing her
song will suffice.

lf you will hear it,
you will go mad.
l will go mad? Then l won't hear it!

Please don't mind. My relationship
with him is very jolly.
This is not a ioking matter.

Some day Sangeeta will
create sensation..

..in the musical world by
being known as Lata Bhosle.
Sensation!

Lata Bhosle means the
combination of..
..Lata Mangeshkar and Asha Bhosle.

lf you mix Lata Mangeshkar
and Asha Bhosle's voice..

..together then it will
become so melodious!

Sangeeta's voice too
is very melodious!
What are you saying?

l have arranged for a variety
entertainment program..

..to present Sangeeta
in front of the people.

The hall is still not fixed.
But the tickets are ready.

So l had come to give 2
tickets of your quota.

The ticket's price is 100 rupees.
- 100 rupees! Don't worry.

l will take the
money later. Take this.

Now l will leave. l have
to visit many places.
l have to sell all the tickets.
Listen! Meet him! He is Mr. Ramesh!

The clock mender! The clock mender!
l met him when l came.

He will progress a lot. He is
a hard working man. Bye-bye!

Let's go.
- Bye.
Please don't mind. Brother Mansukh..
He thought l am a clock mender.

lt's better than being
called a fool.
l have repaired your clock.

Wow! You really turned
out to be a genius!

l think you have started
trusting me a bit.

l am sorry for that day. l
am really very, very sorry.

Look, during lunch time food
is more important than sorry.
Oh! l forgot! You must be hungry!

l will immediately get something!
- Listen! Listen!

l will get late. l have newly
been appointed a GM.

l will have it some other day. As
the fees for repairing the clock.
Okay. Here is your ticket.

But.. its price is 100 rupees.
- No, no. It's on my behalf.

On that day you can hear
Lala Bhosle's song.
And you will get meal too.

Hail God! Today my earnings
have been really good!

Look, if you again
dropped the clock..

..then do remember this
clock mender Ramesh.

Listen.. l think we have
reached the wrong place.

Why? Brother had given
this place's address.

But we were supposed to attend Lata
Bhosle's singing program. Yes.

Look here! There is some dancing
program! Snake dance!

Yes! No, no! Look, it's written!
Mansukhlal presents Vijayanthi lyre!
So.. where did that Lata Bhosle go?
He must have broken his engagement..
..with Lata Bhosle for some reason.

Viiayanthi lyre must
be his new fiancé.

Oh my God! Do you have brother
Mansukh's photo?
Why?

l want to enlarge it and
keep it in my room.
He seems to be iet age's lover.
l don't change my suit in a week.

And he changed his fiancé.
- He is like this only.

Listen!
- Yes!

Meet brother Mansukh who
is in the green room.
He is waiting for you.

Me?
- Yes! Go!
Thank you, Mr. Nandlal!

Go straight and right from the
door. - Thank you very much!
Ramola! And the clock mender!
Brother Mansukh, you too!

Look, look, look! You are a doctor.
And he is a clock mender.

But l don't believe in class
differences in love. Wow! Wow!

lf everybody thinks like
you then it will..

..solve all the problems
in this world.

But.. brother Mansukh.. l
don't understand one thing.

How were we both recognised
at the gate?
We were sent straight to meet you.

l will tell you. Darling! Darling!
- Yes, darling!

You see.. l have given
the instructions..
..to send everybody straight to me.

l had sold the tickets on credit.
So l have to pay the hall's rent.
So l am standing here!

Thank you very much! Very
intelligent girl! Very intelligent!
Darling! Come, darling! Meet them!
She is my cousin Ramola.

Hello. And he is her
cousin.. her friend Ramesh.
And she is my fiancé Urvashi Mitra.
But l lovingly call her Kapil Dev.
Kapil Dev is a man's name.
Yes! That is true!

But Kapil Dev's position in cricket
is that of an all rounder.

Similarly in dancing she
is an all rounder.

Viiayanthi in classical
and Kalpana lyre..
..in pop and modern music.

That's why Viiayanthi lyre is
written on the poster outside.
Darling, brush up your makeup.
Pradeep, apply the rouge properly!

Brother, can l ask you something?
- Yes!

What about that Lata Bhosle?
- Lata Bhosle? Who?

The one whom you had introduced
to us as your fiancé.
lntroduced.. Sangeeta!

Look, do you read yesterday's
newspaper today?
No. No, am l right?
l too don't read it.

Problem with Sangeeta was
that she loved ice-cream.

Whenever we would go out she would
always say l want an ice-cream!

l would tell her that if
you will have ice-cream..
..you will get a sore throat.
You won't become a singer. Still no!
She continued eating ice-cream!

One day she lost her voice. And
the next day we broke off.

l told her to go and marry
some ice-cream vendor!

And look.. Iook at my fate! The
very next day l met Urvashi Mitra.
Listen! Come! Come!

You both please go. There
are enough seats!

Sit in the front row.
- Okay.

Come, Mahendra! How many
people are with you?

Only 2.
- Give 200 rupees.
Current..

Why are you giving
so much current?

Serpent, you don't
even know who l am.

l have removed poison
of great ones.
You are nothing compared to them.
Listen, snake charmer.

Listen, snake charmer. My body
is fatal. Don't harass me.
Don't come near me.
There is no antidote for my bite.
Current..

Why are you giving
so much current?

Serpent, you don't
even know who l am.

l am heartless. l
am very renowned.
l will break all of your ego.
l accept your challenge.
Jumping.

Jumping.
- Current..

Why are you giving
so much current?

Serpent, you don't
even know who l am.

Listen, snake charmer.
My body is fatal.
Don't harass me.
Don't come near me.

Listen, crazy man. Stop playing
this lyre.
You too stop swaying.

Accept defeat. Stop locking
horns with me.
Carefully.
Carefully.
Listen, snake charmer.

Listen, snake charmer.
My body is fatal.
Don't harass me.
Don't come near me.

Why are you giving
so much current?

Serpent, you don't
even know who l am.

These are not your
days to have fun.
My desire is to iust entice you.
My storms will kill you.
Carefully.
Carefully.
Listen, snake charmer.

Listen, snake charmer.
My body is fatal.
Don't harass me.
Don't come near me.
There is no antidote for my bite.
Current..

Why are you giving
so much current?

Serpent, you don't
even know who l am.

Listen, snake charmer.
My body is fatal.
Don't harass me.
Don't come near me.
What you said, it was right. But..

Kailash, what's the matter?
Today you seem worried.

Yes. l was thinking about
what Lala said that day.
That a young son is like a kite.

lf you let him loose, you will
find him in another roof.
ls this true?

Yes, it's true. But
Ramesh won't do this.

Even if he is not like this.. still
you have to get him married.

Now he has become
the general manger.
So find a girl for him.

Ramesh's marriage is not
my sole responsibility.
He is like your son too.

l know of a girl for Ramesh.
She is BA pass.

The family is good. She
lives at Cartar Road.
lf you say, l will call them.

Tomorrow is Sunday. You
can go and meet her.
Please come! Come! Sit!

ls some repairing work
going on in your house?

No, no. My daughter.. is
listening to music. - Oh!

She loves music! Listen!
Kailashpati has come!

My daughter is very smart.
She is one in a million.

Greetings.
- Greetings.

Please remain seated.
- Yes, yes! Please be seated.

Dear, you sit here.
- Yes, dad.

Dear.. what's your name?
- Molly.
Molly?

Molly meaning Shyamli. We
call her Molly at home.

Daddy, in college, students
call me Lee and not Molly.

l like to be called Lee,
not Shyamli.

Have you read Ramayan
and Mahabharat?

Sorry. l am not interested
in mythology.

l am only crazy about music.
Literally crazy.
Who is your favourite singer?
Asia, 3rd world.

No, no. l am not asking
about countries.

No, man! Asia, 3rd world
is not a country.

Look at this! l am absolutely
fine! Let's go, Ramesh!

Carry the suitcase!
- l too will come with you!

Will you be stubborn?
- Yes.

Even if anything happened
on the route..

..then are you a doctor
that you will save me?

l will get ready in 5 minutes.
You come with me.

She must have been my mother
in my past birth.

lf it's a serious matter,
then shall l also come?

l am there. You immediately
call Mr. Lala!

And take a heart specialist's
appointment.

We will have to take him
there immediately.

l will do that. But you
Iook after yourself.

lf the pain starts again then place
half a pill of Sorbitait..
..below his tongue.

She doesn't know English.
Give me the instruction.

Look.. you can't get
up from the bed.
You can't even go to the bathroom.

You will have to do everything
on the bed.
You need complete bed rest. Got it?
Come, Mr. Lala.

Kailashpati, now you will
have to be really careful.

Cardiogram shows that he has
got strokes before too.
Mr. Lala, you have to be careful.

God forbids if anything
happened again..
..then inform me immediately.

Or directly take him to
some hospital. - Okay.

l will leave now.
- Shall l see you to the door?

No need.
- Okay.

Uncle, l think we
should call Ramesh.

Yes. l will call him immediately.
And you don't worry.
l will stay here the whole night.
l am not worried.

l am thinking l am so unfortunate.
Being a doctor..

God is really kind. Everything
will be fine.

You go down. And tell Dhiru
to bring tea for all of us.

Okay.
- Go!
Look.. don't be stubborn.
Why? What were you both whispering?
Look, Pundit! Don't talk at all!

l was iust telling daughter-in-law
that..

..next month we will
throw a grand bash..
..to celebrate your birthday.

And l will give you a present.
- What present?

You are a heart patient. l will
present a doctor to you.

Doctor! If that doctor too
turned out to be like him..
..then l don't want any doctor!

Why are you worrying? l will
give you a lady doctor.
What a doctor you had brought!

He was saying do everything
on the bed!
l am a pure Brahmin.

l don't even look on
that side without..

..winding the sacred
thread on my ear.
And that fool was saying that..

Look, fatso! You will have
to do everything here only!

As far as sacred thread is
concerned, l will wind it in my ear.

Kailashpati! Kailashpati!
Rama! Rama!
Kailashpati!
Rama! Rama!

What happened? - Something has
happened to Kailashpati!
Come quickly!

Rama!
- Mr. Lala, call Dr. Shah.

Till then l will give Pethylen
injection to father.

But dear..
- Our lie will be exposed.

Yes!
- Father won't forgive us!

He will banish me from the
house! Let him do it!

Mr. Lala, l am not iust the
daughter-in-law of this house.
l am a doctor too.
Kailashpati!

Uncle.
- Yes, dear.
Move.

Father.. is it paining a lot?
- Yes, dear.

Now you will feel better. l
will give you the injection.

lniection? You will
give me an injection?

Yes, father. l didn't tell you
this.. that l am a doctor.

Mr. Trivedi, now you
are out of danger.
But you have to be really carefully.

Actually your daughter-in-law
is the one who saved you.

lf you had not given him that
injection immediately..

..then God knows what
would have happened.

l will leave now. Now you
will have to listen to her.

Let's go, Mr. Lala.
- Come.

Give.
- Thank you.
Come.
Father.. take your medicine.
l had told you before.

This is not a house. It's
Ramesh's mother's temple.
But you lied!
Forgive me, father.
l never forgive a liar!
Father.. l agree that l had lied.

When l was quite young..
l lost my parents.
l was raised by my uncle.
Since childhood l had a dream.

That someday l will
have my own house.

l will have a father.
l will be loved.
That's why l took the aid of lie.
Please have your medicine.
l don't have any bond with a liar!

l don't even take water
offered by them!

Fine, father! l will leave.
l will leave forever.

But in the last 8 months..
if l have served you well..
..if you have some love for me..
..then please have this medicine.

lf not mine, then take it
from the nurse's hand!
What happened, dear? What happened?
Nothing, uncle Dhiru!
Rama! What happened?

Now l can't live in this house!
l am a liar! l am a liar!
Kailashpati! What am l hearing?

You have told daughter-in-law
to leave the house!
You know that l hate lies!

To hell with the truth that
breaks a happy family!

There is no place for
liars in my house.
Then listen to me carefully, Pundit!

ln this house there is no place
for me and your son too!
Why? What did Ramesh do?

Father.. Rama was always
against lying.
But l only forced her, father.
And l helped Ramesh.

Because l was not ready
to sacrifice their love..
..for the sake of your foolishness!

lf daughter-in-law has to leave
this house for lying..

..then there is no place for
you too in this house.

Because you too considered
a big lie as the truth.

l? Which lie did l consider
to be true?

What you thought about
educated girl..
..was that not a lie?

Rama was educated but she pretended
to be an illiterate.
So she is a liar!

And she served and respected
you for 8 months!
Was that not true?

Look at the sacrifice of
this girl, Kailashpati!
To save you she revealed her truth.

Knowing that by doing so
her world will shatter.
Was that not true?

And your false delusion
only was true?

Today you have told her
to leave the house.

And a week ago you used
to praise her so much.

Shameless! You didn't even think
that she is carrying your heir.

God might forgive you. But
l will never forgive you.

Ramesh.. call daughter-in-law. Tell
her that l have called her.
Rama! Rama!
What happened, dear?
Uncle Dhiru, where is Rama?
l don't know. She was here only.

l think she has gone
to her uncle's house.

Uncle Dhiru, look after father.
l will go and bring her.
Where is daughter-in-law?

l think she has gone
to uncle's house.
Oh! You go and call Lala.
Forgive me, dear.
Forgive me.

What is this? Who told
you to leave your bed?
What do you think of yourself?
l agree that this is your house.

You can tell anybody to leave
anytime. This is your right.

But you don't have any right
not to pay heed to a doctor!
And to do as you please!
Scold me, dear. Scold me.

After my mother died
when l was small..
..there was nobody to scold me.

So l thought whatever l think
and do, that is right.

You fill that dearth of mother,
dear. Scold me.
Father!

Has daughter-in-law come?
- No!
Where did she go?

Mr. Lala, what if she has
taken some wrong step?

What wrong step?
- No.. l mean suicide..

Why are you so worried
for such a girl?

An elderly man scolded her a bit
and she has raised such commotion.

Son, you don't worry. l will
get another wife for you.
Another wife?

l think along with your heart,
your mind too has become weak!

You banished such a nice girl!
And you don't even regret it!

Regret it? l have no regret
for such a daughter-in-law!

You don't worry, son. l have
selected a nice girl for you.
Do you want to meet her?
Come inside, dear!
Lala, you had fooled me!

Did you see? How l
fooled both of you!
You won't reform!

Father! What happened? Father!
Please relax!
Please relax!

Daughter-in-law, not relax..
say rest. Rest.
